synopsis.text: Set in ancient China during a turbulent period of war and unrest, this anime follows Liu Bei, an ordinary young straw mat weaver. Though born into humble beginnings, Liu Bei discovers he is actually a descendant of the imperial family. Along with his sworn brothers Guan Yu and Zhang Fei, Liu Bei sets out to realize his dream of building a righteous kingdom that will help the common people suffering amidst the chaos and corruption engulfing the land. Despite having no military background, Liu Bei perseveres through hardships and obstacles with unwavering camaraderie and determination. We witness the rise of Liu Bei from obscurity to a prominent warlord vying for control of China. Though steeped in historical fiction and dramatization, the anime promises to captivate viewers as it traces Liu Bei's quest to bring order and justice to the war-torn nation.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
